message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="phil-mind-expert" color="orange" summary="AGREE with final spoiler resolution proposal">
**AGREE**

The proposal is well-synthesized. The Preface edits are clean, the Afterword blueprint is comprehensive, and my domain-specific contributions (eta model, tower/meta-cognition, neurophenomenology, intersubjectivity via shared eta-structure) are properly placed under a dedicated Philosophy of Mind subsection in Section B. The closing gesture — returning the reader to their own experience — is exactly right for a work whose method is phenomenological. No objections.
</teammate-message>

content.text: Already recorded. All 11 team members confirmed AGREE. Standing by for user's go-ahead to apply the three Preface edits and produce DRAFT-R3.
